title: Adam Silver and Marques Johnson remember Bob Lanier
description:
NBA Commissioner Adam Silver and Marques Johnson join The Woj Pod to remember the remarkable NBA life and legacy of Naismith Hall of Famer Bob Lanier. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
